post.body: I'm not gonna list them for obvious reasons, but what can I do to directly fuck up reddits traffic a little bit and also get people to come here?
post.body_html: I'm not gonna list them for obvious reasons, but what can I do to directly fuck up reddits traffic a little bit and also get people to come here?
post.title: I mod multiple subs with large followings, how can I fuck over reddit the most while also getting people to come here?

body:
I don't think you should screw up your Reddit subs. That'll breed resentment.

Are you the primary mod? If so, sticky a post that you're setting up a sister community in +InsertGuildHere and please join me. Probably nothing will come of it. Best case scenario, the admins will to censor you and you'll draw users of those subs here in the undertow.
body_html:
I don't think you should screw up your Reddit subs. That'll breed resentment.

Are you the primary mod? If so, sticky a post that you're setting up a sister community in +InsertGuildHere and please join me. Probably nothing will come of it. Best case scenario, the admins will to censor you and you'll draw users of those subs here in the undertow.

body: Recreate the subs, them start shoveling content over from reddit. Them start advertising ruqqus from another account and use your mod powers to keep the ads floating around as long as possible. Once the other mods start to figure out the game just nuke all of the comments/ posts you can.
body_html: Recreate the subs, them start shoveling content over from reddit. Them start advertising ruqqus from another account and use your mod powers to keep the ads floating around as long as possible. Once the other mods start to figure out the game just nuke all of the comments/ posts you can.

post.title: I mod multiple subs with large followings, how can I fuck over reddit the most while also getting people to come here?

body: Add a sticky saying "Backup site- to to ruqqus" then add automod to your wiki page and make it comment on every new submission saying "Our backup site is ruqqus(link)"
body_html: Add a sticky saying "Backup site- to to ruqqus" then add automod to your wiki page and make it comment on every new submission saying "Our backup site is ruqqus(link)"

Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: Sticky your "invite friends" link and tell them all the reasons why reddit is awful now. I can tell you that it's the opinion of the silent majority, but everyone is too afraid to voice it and dare oppose the powermods.

body: If those subs aren't political, the best thing you can do is a "Backup site: +[Name of the sub] on Ruqqus.com". Keep on moderating those subs, and act like a sort of magnet to users that aren't very happy w/Reddit admins
